subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Kansas City signed the unrestricted free agent Wade Smith to a two-year contract. Smith, who has primarily been a tackle in his six-year career, is expected to compete for the center spot with the Chiefs, the team said. Smith played the last two seasons with the Jets, primarily as an offensive lineman and on special teams.
